attributes.action: Get the Exempt Children to go home as part of the UK lockdown
attributes.additional_details: During Lockdown many children have been sent home due to their safety, however, Exempt kids are more likely to have a greater effect if they get the virus making school a more dangerous place to go. Some school cannot keep those kids apart from each other and the schools are being stressed trying to make the school a more safe place, why not instead of sending the Exempt kids in, send the kids that do not have a place to work so they are not missing out on the important subjects!
attributes.background: Send the exempt children home as part of the UK lockdown to ease the stress off of schools, send the kids that do not have a place to work so they are not missing out on the important subjects!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government has confirmed that all children and students will return to face-to-face education in schools and colleges from 8 March.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
